identity.name: Lumina Bank
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss typography with Jewel-tone luxury.
Content is King: Data is the hero. Charts and numbers must be legible and beautiful.
Negative Space: Use whitespace to create a sense of exclusivity and calm.
Contrast: High contrast for accessibility and authority.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-sm font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 shadow-sm font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.outline: border-2 border-primary/20 text-primary hover:bg-primary/5 hover:border-primary transition-colors

cards.base: bg-white border border-border/60 shadow-card rounded-xl p-6 transition-all hover:shadow-hover
cards.glass: bg-white/70 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/40 shadow-glass rounded-xl

inputs.default: h-12 bg-white border-border focus:border-primary focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 rounded-md transition-all
inputs.label: text-sm font-medium text-foreground/80 mb-2 block

navigation.sidebar: bg-white border-r border-border h-screen sticky top-0
navigation.link: flex items-center gap-3 px-4 py-3 text-sm font-medium text-muted-foreground hover:text-primary hover:bg-primary/5 rounded-md transition-colors

login_hero.usage: Login page split layout hero image

general: Implement the 'Swiss High-Contrast' theme. Use whitespace aggressively.
Do NOT use gradients for main backgrounds. Use them ONLY for the Virtual Cards.
Ensure all interactive elements have `data-testid` attributes.
Follow the 'Bento Grid' layouts defined in the `layouts` section.
For the 'Send Money' flow, use a step-by-step wizard approach to reduce cognitive load.
Admin panel should be denser than the User Dashboard. Use smaller text and tighter padding.

specific_pages.login: Split screen. Left: Login Form (Clean, Minimal). Right: `login_hero` image with a dark overlay and a quote about financial freedom.
specific_pages.user_dashboard: Hero section is the 'Total Balance' card. Use the 'card_bg_dark' as a subtle texture for the balance card.
specific_pages.virtual_cards: Display cards using the 'Glassmorphism' style. Allow users to 'flip' the card to see CVV (simulated).
specific_pages.admin_users: Use a Shadcn Table. Add a 'Status' badge (Green for Active, Red for Blocked).

universal_guidelines: Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
